text: My prayer recently has been that God would increase my distaste for the crap in my life that’s unhealthy, unhelpful, and un-Christ-like. He has. But that has left me feeling so unworthy. And that’s when I remember that sanctification is a process. Thank God for his grace!
author: jonseidl

text: Having lived 7 yrs on the east coast, it’s so confusing being in New Orleans because the NOLA accent sounds so much like Long Island! #nola #neworleans #LongIsland
author: jonseidl

text: Amazon. I rented it and then bought it after because it was so good. So many people I want to show it to.
author: jonseidl

text: Last night I watched American Gospel until almost midnight. I cried at times. I can’t fully tell you why. But it was the theology I was raised believing and have come out of. The best doc I’ve ever seen. Thanks @BergerRussell @BKimber @costiwhinn
author: jonseidl

text:
What’s #marriage like in year 10? Awesome! 

Also, your wife intentionally gets chip flavors you don’t like so that she can have them to herself.
author: jonseidl

text: Something I’ve been thinking a lot about lately as I work on my book: A proper understanding of #anxiety isn’t the absence of #worry; its learning where to properly place and order your worry in light of who God is. #selfcare #ocd #MentalHealthAwareness #mentalhealth
author: jonseidl

text: The joy on my daughter’s face when she saw I came home with “rainbow flowers” is what makes being a #dad so awesome.
author: jonseidl

text:
When you show up to church and you and your friends have dressed exactly alike. 

Black jacket 
Black shirt 
Jeans 
Leopard print shoes 
Vest 
Plaid shirt 
Canvas shoes
author: jonseidl
